pages:
[46-1-59 CPA v46.0]
[Attempt to translate...]
First tests with hostile mobs were undoubtedly the most interesting. Zombies accepted the infection, and seem to rapidly grow some kind of parasite. It seems to intelligently collect nutrients from anything
near it using a variant of void energy. The parasite also doesn't affect its host too much, as if it knows that killing them would also strand it.

We have section 6F trying to use the parasite for some kind of automation... or something along those lines.
[End of Transcript]
